scripts.bundle-android-dev: ENVFILE=.env.dev react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.bundle-android-staging: ENVFILE=.env.staging react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.bundle-android-prod: ENVFILE=.env.prod react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.build-android-apk-dev: yarn android:bundle-dev; cd android && ENVFILE=.env.dev ./gradlew app:assembleDevRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/dev/release
scripts.build-android-apk-staging: yarn bundle:android-staging; cd android && ENVFILE=.env.staging ./gradlew app:assembleStagingRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/staging/release
scripts.build-android-apk-prod: yarn bundle:android-prod; cd android && ENVFILE=.env.prod ./gradlew app:assembleProdRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/prod/release
scripts.build-android-aab-prod: yarn bundle:android; cd android && ENVFILE=.env.prod ./gradlew app:bundleProdRelease && open app/build/outputs/bundle/prodRelease
